title: yArukku un dhyAnam nErumO
sahitya:
yArukku un dhyAnam nErumO gurunAthA avan bhAgyamE bhAgyam


anupallavi

  pArukkuL eppOdum bhavamayalaDaiyAdu pAshamAm karamuLOn bhayam aNugiDAdu


caraNam 1    aimpulangaL nittam avan iSTappaDiyADum ajnAna iruLellAm avanai viTTE Odum 
anburugi brahmAnandattil kUTTum allalelAm Oya aruL peru nilai nADum
    caraNam 2    tIdenbavadaniDam shEravE shErAdu ceppum mUvAshaigaL tirumbiyum pArAdu 
kAdalAi avaniyE karmangaL sArAdu kaSTa niSTUram orukkAlumE vArAdu
    caraNam 3    avanai darishittOrkku arum tuyaram pOghum avaravar manadin abhISTamum uNDAgum 
tava vaDivAnadOr sadguru avanAghum svAminAthan shollum satyamum aduvAghum
